outputs.name: rel_humid
outputs.description: A data collection or value indicating the relative humidity [%]

inputs.name: _dry_bulb
inputs.description: A value or data collection representing dry bulb temperature [C]

inputs.description: A value or data collection representing dew point temperature [C]

Calculate relative humidity from Dry Bulb Temperature and Dew Point Temperature.
